text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar There are CURRENTLY TODAY 56,000 families who lost loved ones to the coronavirus that would ADAMANTLY disagree with your appraisal. They ALL will NOT forget the Trump Idiocracy for the gross negligence/incompetence in dealing w/COVID-19 come November. VOTE BLUE!
